text: Here is the list of the President of the Council of Ministers of the Mexican Empire, First Minister, or Chancellor of Mexico. == Former holders of the title== *First Empire *José Manuel de Herrera May 19, 1822 – March 19, 1823 *Second Empire *José María Lacunza 13 June 1864 – 6 October 1866 *Teodosio Lares October 6, 1866 – March 18, 1867 *Santiago Vidaurri March 19, 1867 – June 19, 1867 Category:Mexican politicians Category:Lists of politicians
title: President of the Council of Ministers of the Mexican Empire
